msg.msgText: Name Specifies a name for the OAuth profile. ResourceURL Specifies the authorization server URL to use to validate the access token. KeyFileName Specifies the name of the file that contains the SSL certificate that is used to connect to the OAuth server. AuthKey Specifies the name of the key that contains the access token. Default:access_token UserInfoURL Specifies the authorization server URL to use to retrieve the user information. UserInfoKey Specifies the name of the key that is used to retrieve the user information. GroupInfoKey The name of the key that is used to retrieve the group information from the user info URL response. If specified, MessageSight does not retrieve group information from any other source.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command help.
